name: Spelleton: Skellord's Domain
description:
Saoirse, a necromancer in training, goes on a quest to defeat the Skellords of Spelleton and prove to the world that they are the most powerful necromancer to have ever lived… or died. Take control of undead creatures and assemble a powerful skeletal army, or destroy their bones to empower yourself with necrotic energy. Will your sacrifices be worth it, or was the true magic the boney friends you made along the way?

Controls:

Left or Right Click: Move Player.

Q: Fire a damaging spell towards your cursor.

W: Raise a nearby creature as your skeletal thrall.

E: Command your units to move to a position, attacking anything in their way.

R: Recall your units back to your position.
